Press, 1998), viii + 828 pp. Converted into web usable data in May 2009 by Dr. Marvin Bolt and Steven Lucy, working at the Webster Institute of the Adler Planetarium.

abstract.p: Found the 'real' h Centauri; unsure what star is the 'false' h Centauri. Saw the largest sunspot that JH has ever seen. Saddened to learn that TM's son [George] is seriously ill.
